questions.title: 他对我说了很多奇怪的话以至于我听不懂。
questions.answer: He spoke to me with such a lot of strange words that I could notunderstand them.

questions.title: 这个主意太好了以至于我们很快就接受了。
questions.answer: It is such a good idea that we accept it quickly.

questions.title: 玛丽是一个好心人，以至于每个人都喜欢她。
questions.answer: Mary is such a kind woman that everyone likes her.

questions.title: 我们玩得太高兴了，以至于错过了午饭时间。
questions.answer: We had such a nice time that we miss the lunch time.

title: ——去你家的路太远了，我不想去。
——我可以载你。

answer.en: The way to your house is such a long way that I don't want to go there.

title: ——你借我的书太深奥了，我读不懂。
——你应该静下心来。

answer.en: The book you lent me is such a deep one that I can't read.

title: ——这场足球赛的加时赛时间太长了以至于我没耐心等到结束了。
——就一会儿了，美国队马上就要出局了。

answer.en: The overtime of this football game is such a long one that I haveimpatience to wait it out.
A little while. The USA is about to out.

title: ——汤姆的言行举止太恶劣了，我实在忍受不了。
——那天他一定紧张了。

answer.en: Tom's behaviour is so bad that I couldn't bear him.
He must be tense that day.
